name: Pickcrafter bad copy
description:
Hi  ! I'm a little developper and it's the first game I finish. I made it with Unity and it look pretty bad but I'm proud of it.

The game is a bad copy of Pickcrafter. It's basically a clicker game where you need blocks to upgrade your tools to mine more effectively. 

There is certainly a lot of bug so you can report there in the comment and I thank you if you download my game :)

Sorry for my englishI'm french.
